sections.heading: Persons presumed to be doing business in state.
sections.text: 522.02 Persons presumed to be doing business in state.—Any person maintaining an office or soliciting personally or by agent such business in this state shall be presumed to be doing business in this state. History.—s. 2, ch. 6235, 1911; RGS 4939; CGL 7026.
